mapper.select:
SELECT shipment_id, line_id, line_name, license_card_id, start_place, end_place, DATE_FORMAT(plan_leave_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s')as planLeaveTime, DATE_FORMAT(plan_arrive_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as planArriveTime, DATE_FORMAT(real_leave_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as realLeaveTime, DATE_FORMAT(real_arrive_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as realArriveTime, sys_mileage, gps_mileage, gps_collect, gps_device, is_skewing, txd_flag, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as createDate FROM line_mileage
and shipment_id = #{shipmentId} and license_card_id = #{licenseCardId} and line_id = #{lineId} and txd_flag = #{txdFlag}
mapper.insert: insert into line_mileage (shipment_id, line_id, line_name, license_card_id, start_place, end_place, plan_leave_time, plan_arrive_time, real_leave_time, real_arrive_time, sys_mileage, gps_mileage, gps_collect, gps_device, is_skewing, txd_flag, create_date) values (#{shipmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planArriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realArriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gpsMileage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gpsCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gpsDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSkewing,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{txdFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
